short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download audio files from ChatGPT conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your ChatGPT experience with a convenient download button added next to each reply. With a single click, users can download the response as an audio file (Mp3, AAC), making it easy to save and replay ChatGPT's insights anytime, anywhere. This feature transforms ChatGPT into a voice-ready companion, seamlessly converting text responses into audio for your convenience.

V1.1 Updates :
- Added more voices 
- Support Mp3 file format beside AAC . 

For any issue kindly report via email.
